content:
Since the beginning of a large -scale invasion of the Russian Federation in Ukraine, the Office of the Prosecutor General has documented 16,837 crimes against national security. 128 718 military crimes of Russia were also registered.

About thisinformsOffice of the Prosecutor General.

In addition, according to juvenile prosecutors, the Russian aggression was injured in 1801, 536 children were killed, 1265 were injured in varying severity.

The department emphasizes that these figures are not final, since work continues to be installed in places of active fighting, in temporarily occupied and liberated territories.

As reported by the Armyinform, a resident of Chernihiv region was sentenced to 15 years for the fact thathanded over to the occupiers of ATO participantsAnd reported about drones.
title: Almost 129,000 military crimes of Russia have been documented in Ukraine
description: About it reports the Office of the Prosecutor General. In addition, according to juvenile ...
author: Army Inform
